GPIB Settings:Primary Address

Short name: Primary Addr

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: VXI/GPIB-VXI Backplane, GPIB BoardInterface, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME RBD Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr, GPIB Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME MemAcc

Returns the primary address of the GPIB controller used by the given session.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read Only
